text: Hianagi tamage Jiu vahe'ma mani'naku'ma hanu'za, kasegemofo amage antegahaze. Tamage oku avufgama taga hu'zana agu'afi tumo'amofo Anumzamofo Avamumo erifore hugahianki, amega avufgare erifore osugahie. E'inama nehaza vahe'mo'za vahe'mofo tegatirompage, Anumzamofontegati ra zamagima erisaza zanku nehakaze.
